name: Smash (itch) (Akshaj Krishnan)
description:
Hello gamers, this is a cute, platform smashing, 2-d  game.

Your goal for this game is simple, you have to smash the white blocks to get more points but avoid the red blocks.  You will get points, if you smash the white blocks and you can use those points to get new skins for your player but you will lose points if you touch the red blocks.

<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

use keys A (to go left) or D (to go right)

you can also use right and left arrow keys
